# Documentation Policies

## Goals
- Improve discoverability of project information
- Standardize issue templates
- Create comprehensive security documentation
- Implement automated documentation updates

## Strategies
1. Add CODEOWNERS file to identify responsible parties
2. Create issue templates for different types of issues (bug, feature, documentation)
3. Add SECURITY.md with security policy and reporting procedures
4. Implement labeler configuration for automatic label assignment
5. Set up release-drafter configuration for automated release notes

## Implementation
- All new features should include documentation updates
- Documentation should be reviewed and updated regularly
- Automated tools should be used to maintain consistency
